apiKey.label: Cortex API Key
apiKey.help: Your API key from Cortex (or use ${CORTEX_OPENCLAW_API_KEY})

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Inject relevant memories before every AI turn (default: true)

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically store conversation exchanges after every AI turn (default: true)

maxRecallResults.label: Max Recall Results
maxRecallResults.help: Maximum memory chunks injected into context per turn

recallMode.label: Recall Mode
recallMode.help: 'fast' (default) or 'thinking' (personalised recall with deeper graph traversal)

graphContext.label: Graph Context
graphContext.help: Include knowledge graph relations in recalled context (default: true)

ignoreTerm.label: Ignore Term
ignoreTerm.help: Messages containing this term will be excluded from recall and capture (default: cortex-ignore)

debug.label: Debug Logging
debug.help: Enable verbose debug logs for API calls and responses
